attributes.action: Have London Public Transport reduce prices back to normal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to see the ridiculous increase in TFL's prices stopped, and have them returned to normal or lower.
The extra rise is a serious issue, with examples such as 16-18 year old's being forced to pay £6.30 to get a travel card. It is even worse for people outside of full-time education or people in work.
This is the time to do something about it because the situation to becoming ridiculous.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with The Mayor and the Greater London Authority.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
